ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading

Class TradeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading.TradeList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable, Observer

    public class TradeList
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable, Observer
    TradeList represents a collection of trades a user is currently involved in. This is the model for the TradeHistory workflow.
